title: Cinema Otaku
description: A responsive anime streaming website, where you can watch and search for animes by its name, alternative names, categories and first letter.
quote: "I wholeheartedly embrace the ethos of educational code and the spirit of knowledge sharing, with the sincere hope that it is wielded for good and never misused" - Aaron Wendell
private: The source code is private, as it is currently being sold.
